classmethod configure(*, update_mode, synchronous_updates=1)[source]¶

configure the adaptive voter opinion formation model component

Parameters:
  • update_mode (element of Enum Cultur.update_modes) – chooses between the basic and the fast update mode. The fast update mode is preferred but needs the nodes of the acquaintance_network to stay the same
  • synchronous_updates ((optional) positive int) – how many opinion updates should be done at once
multiple_updates = 1¶
next_update_time(t)[source]¶
opinion_update_basic(t)[source]¶

update the aquaintance network following the adaptive voter model prescription by (Holme, Newman - 2006)

update the aquaintance network following the adaptive voter model prescription by (Holme, Newman - 2006)
